mapper.insert: insert into A_reserve (num, member_id, dog_num, room_num, checkin_date, checkout_date, start_time, end_time, name, phone, room_price, regdate, state) values(A_reserve_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{dog_num}, #{room_num}, #{checkin_date}, #{checkout_date}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{room_price}, sysdate, '예약대기중')
mapper.select: select num, member_id, dog_num, room_num, checkin_date, checkout_date, start_time, end_time, name, phone, room_price, regdate, state from A_reserve where member_id=#{member_id} and dog_num=#{dog_num} and room_num=#{room_num}
